productInfo.title: MODERN, SLIM, AND BEAUTIFUL
productInfo.info: Logitech Pebble M350 modern design fits your curated lifestyle, accents your desk setup, and is slim enough to toss in your bag and bring to the coffee shop.

productInfo.title: CLICK AND SCROLL IN SILENCE
productInfo.info: Work in a cafe, library, or even a crowded train without disturbing anyone around you. You’ll get the same click feel you love, but make about 90% less noise.1 Even the wide rubber scroll wheel glides in silence.

productInfo.title: CONNECT THE WAY YOU LIKE
productInfo.info: Connect simply with Bluetooth ® or the tiny 2.4 GHz USB receiver -stored in the magnetic cover of the mouse- and never worry about annoying drop-offs or lag up to a 32.8 ft (10m) range.

productInfo.title: ORGANIC SHAPE, NATURAL FIT
productInfo.info: Logitech Pebble M350 has been designed to be extra slim, while still fitting naturally in the palm of your hand. The soft rounded sides are so comfortable, you’ll never want to let it go..1 Even the wide rubber scroll wheel glides in silence.

productInfo.title: THE RIGHT COLOR FOR YOU
productInfo.info: Choose Logitech Pebble M350 in off-white, graphite, blue or rose pink to perfectly match the rest of your accessories.

productInfo.title: WORK WHEREVER LIFE TAKES YOU
productInfo.info: Logitech Pebble M350 tracks fast and accurately whether you use it on a table at your favorite coffee shop or directly on your bed covers.

productInfo.title: GO LONGER BETWEEN BATTERIES
productInfo.info: 18-month battery3 life means you don’t have to worry about losing power. Logitech Pebble M350 automatically goes into battery-saving sleep mode when you’re taking a break.
